Sentencas: Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs) offer advantages for micro-Combined Heat and Power (mu CHP), but currently suffer from slow startup (>1 h) and limited thermal cycling which reduces the applications, energy savings and economics.
Titulo: Investigation of startup, performance and cycling of a residential furnace integrated with micro-tubular flame-assisted fuel cells for micro-combined heat and power

Sentencas: In this work, a micro-Tubular SOFC stack is integrated into a residential furnace to create a micro-Tubular Flame-assisted Fuel Cell (mT-FFC) mu CHF system.
Titulo: Investigation of startup, performance and cycling of a residential furnace integrated with micro-tubular flame-assisted fuel cells for micro-combined heat and power

Sentencas: A high power density of 202 mW cm(-2) is reported operating in synthesis gas generated from fuel-rich combustion of natural gas/air.
Titulo: Investigation of startup, performance and cycling of a residential furnace integrated with micro-tubular flame-assisted fuel cells for micro-combined heat and power

Sentencas: Unlike previous reports, instabilities in the polarization are attributed to low temperature of the oxygen reduction reaction at the cathode.
Titulo: Investigation of startup, performance and cycling of a residential furnace integrated with micro-tubular flame-assisted fuel cells for micro-combined heat and power

Sentencas: The mT-FFC stack achieved peak power density in 6 min after ignition.
Titulo: Investigation of startup, performance and cycling of a residential furnace integrated with micro-tubular flame-assisted fuel cells for micro-combined heat and power

Sentencas: 200 thermal cycles at an average heating rate of 215 degrees C.min(-1 )and average cooling rate of 176 degrees C.min(-1) were conducted and a low degradation rate of 0.0325 V per 100 cycles per fuel cell was achieved.
Titulo: Investigation of startup, performance and cycling of a residential furnace integrated with micro-tubular flame-assisted fuel cells for micro-combined heat and power

Sentencas: Low NOx emissions (10 ppm) and high combined efficiency is reported.
Titulo: Investigation of startup, performance and cycling of a residential furnace integrated with micro-tubular flame-assisted fuel cells for micro-combined heat and power
